ingredients.ingredient: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of shrimp soup
1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of mushroom soup
1 (1 pound) loaf processed cheese food, cubed

cookingTips: Heat dip gently over medium-low heat and stir frequently to prevent scorching
Cube processed cheese for even melting
Transfer to fondue pot and keep warm with low heat during serving
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This retro appetizer needs heat management. How would you keep it warm without separating or becoming too thick?
